definitions.definition: A tiny opening in the skin .
examples: I could sense the sweat dripping out of all my pores .

definitions.definition: By extension any small opening or interstice , especially one of many, or one allowing the passage of a fluid .

main_definition: A tiny opening in the skin .
secondary_definitions: By extension any small opening or interstice , especially one of many, or one allowing the passage of a fluid .
